effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 289,202 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 159,235.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,151 Intellect and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 1.9 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
